title: Vintage Gas Stations
description: Classic gas stations, attendants, and road culture

questions.question: What service did a full-service gas station attendant typically perform in addition to pumping gas?
options: Check the oil and clean the windshield

questions.question: What collectible items did many gas stations give away to attract customers in the 1950s and 1960s?
What type of free road guides did gas stations commonly offer to traveling motorists?
What was the approximate price of a gallon of gasoline in the United States in 1960?
Which oil company used the slogan 'You can trust your car to the man who wears the star'?
What did the iconic Texaco gas station attendant uniform include?
options: A white shirt, bow tie, and cap with a star

questions.question: What was the name of the gas station chain known for its flying red horse (Pegasus) logo?
Which gas station brand featured a green dinosaur as its mascot?
What type of vending machine was commonly found at gas stations dispensing cold drinks?
What event in 1973 caused long lines at gas stations across the United States?
What promotional trading stamps could customers collect at certain gas stations?
What type of gas pump featured a visible glass cylinder at the top that showed the gasoline?
What was 'Ethyl' gasoline, commonly advertised at vintage gas stations?
What bell or signal would ring when a car drove over the hose at a gas station?
Which major oil company's name was changed from 'Standard Oil of New Jersey' to a single word?
